channel.title: +०९ on Vishvas's notes
channel.description: Recent content in +०९ on Vishvas's notes

item.title: Flights of fancy
item.description: The black basaltic rock had assumed the delightful shape of a large throne, fit for a mighty rakSha like atikAya, who was slain by the saumitra. It was a cool refugium in the hot plains baked by the eye of mitra and varuNa, a far cry from its origins as a magmatic upwelling from the innards of the Earth around the time of the final demise of the non-avian dinosaurs. I rested facing the direction of the gods.

item.title: The Satmala adventures
item.description: 1) Chandvad (Chandradityapura) 2) Chandvad fort 3) chandreshvarI cave temple 4) reNukA temple 5) indrANI temple 6) indragiri durga (Indrai fort) 7) Koldher fort 8)Rajdher fort After a long bus journey the shUdra, the feral brahmin, Mis-creant and myself entrenched ourselves in the lodge of the lATas. After enjoying a sumptous ghee-rich meal that in our youth we could eat without much thought we proceeded by means of the second bus to middle of nowhere town/village of Chandvad.
